name: QOTD
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y nginx && sudo rm -f /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/default && sudo rm -rf /usr/share/nginx/html && sudo ln -sfn /workspaces/qotd/public /usr/share/nginx/html && sudo ln -sf /workspaces/qotd/etc/qotd/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/qotd.conf
